==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|Mumei|ja={{rubi|無|む|明|めい}}}}, also read {{Lang|{{wt|無明#Japanese|mumyou}}|ja={{rubi|無|む|明|みょう}}}}, is the Japanese translation of {{w|Avidyā (Buddhism)|avidyā}} &mdash; a Sanskrit word meaning ignorance or unenlightenment.
** It is pronounced the same as {{ja|{{wt|無名}}|rm=mumei}} which means "nameless" or "unknown."
